summary.para: Contains classes specific to the Windows Forms Pivot Chart Module functionality.
Contains options that you can use to configure the Pivot Chart Module.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.PivotChartOptions.DataAccessMode

summary.para: Specifies the mode used to access the Collection Source’s collection.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies the mode used to access a collection of business objects in List Views.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.PivotChartOptions.ExportedTypes

summary.para: Returns the list of Module-specific types exported to the Application Model.

member.value: The list of Module-specific types exported to the Application Model.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.PivotChartOptions.ShowAdditionalNavigation

summary.para: Specifies the default value for the IModelPivotChartNavigation.GenerateRelatedAnalysisGroup property.

member.value: true, to enable context navigation for the Pivot Chart Module, by default; otherwise, false.

summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.v23.2.dll assembly.
Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.PivotChartWindowsFormsModule.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the module.

member.param: An object which represents the Object Space used to update the database.
A System.Version object which represents the current database version.
member.returns: An IEnumerable<> list of updaters that handle database updates for the module.

summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your WinForms application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Pivot Chart Module to your application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.PivotChartApplicationBuilderExtensions.AddPivotChart(DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.IModuleBuilder{DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.IWinApplicationBuilder},System.Action{DevExpress.ExpressApp.PivotChart.Win.PivotChartOptions})

summary.para: Adds the Pivot Chart Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
Options that you can use to configure the Pivot Chart Module.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
